item.title:
Emma Watson says she will “absolutely” return to acting.
She will star in an upcoming film that is set to begin shooting early next year.
(https://ft.com/content/045a2d24-f207-4cc3-9a55-5d61a9633bf0…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Emma Watson stepped away from acting because she “wasn’t very happy, if I’m being honest.”
“I think I felt a bit caged. The thing I found really hard was that I had to go out and sell something that I really didn’t have very much control over.”
(https://ft.com/content/045a2d24-f207-4cc3-9a55-5d61a9633bf0…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: The Writers Guild of America has unanimously called for a strike to start from today, marking it the first WGA strike in 15 years.
item.author: FilmUpdates
